message: What a weirdo. How could he freak out about scalding his tongue, but completely fail to notice his hand?
Was he just trying to look tough or something? Awfully childish of him.
Still...
Whatever the case, it's my fault he got hurt窶病gain. And once again, I'm not doing anything to help.
I watch Noiz behind the counter, guilt squeezing my guts.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Look, I'm sorry. About yesterday, too... I just assumed you were messing with Ren."

name: 蒼葉
message: "But you were just removing the worm, right? ...Thanks."

name: ノイズ
message: "I just did that while I was in there anyway. Really, I was trying to figure out the deal with your Allmate."

name: 蒼葉
message: "The deal?"

name: ノイズ
message: "How the hell you managed to beat me. I figured you might've modded your Allmate, so I had a look."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...What the hell?"

name: ノイズ
message: "I took a look around. And got rid of the worm, that's all. Didn't find anything interesting, other than the fact it's an old model. Why don't you upgrade?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "...That's none of your business."

name: ノイズ
message: "I guess it wasn't that old when you were playing... Still, it's a pretty early model, right?"

name: ノイズ
message: "I came to this island and started Rhyme about three or four years ago, but models like this were already obsolete."

name: ノイズ
message: "Anyway, I checked out your Allmate 'cause I felt like it. And I removed that worm 'cause I felt like it too."

name: ノイズ
message: "So there's nothing to apologize for. How naive are you?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ngh... What the hell do you expect? If you'd just said something first, I―"

name: ノイズ
message: "By the way, you hungry?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "What?"
The sudden change in topic catches me off guard.
Am I hungry? What does that have to do with anything?
Noiz goes downstairs without waiting for an answer.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Where are you going?"

name: ノイズ
message: "Out."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hey, hold on."
I run down the stairs after him, but Noiz has already left the apartment.
What the hell? We were talking a second ago.
You just can't pin the guy down...
Squashing my frustration, I follow him out the door.
